Chapter 16 

     3 (1 Corinthians 6:20). Effects of Appetite in Israel's Experience.--Whenever their appetite was restricted, the Israelites were dissatisfied, and murmured and complained against Moses and Aaron, and against God. . . . But God was proving His people. In order to develop what was in their hearts, He allowed them to pass through severe trials. When they failed, He brought them around to the same point again, trying them a little more closely and severely....
